description:
Thank you, as always, for your continued support. I am Sagara Rei, a manger at Sena Productions. After filming the commercial, Izumi-san has regressed completely back into the world of otaku.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If Only It Had All Been a Dream
J’aurais préféré que ce soit un rêve
ユメナラヨカッタノニ
